formElement.label: StartServer Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the start server script, including filename and extension. i.e: 'startServer.bat' or '/path/to/startServer.sh' or 'C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere\AppServer\bin\startServer.bat'.

formElement.label: Instance name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the instance of the server to be started. i.e: 'server01'.

formElement.label: Additional Commands:
formElement.documentation: Additional commands to be entered for the startup of the server.
